items.content_html: Text Enhancer is a lightweight browser extension that helps you improve your writing anywhere on the web. Whether you're writing social media posts, or commenting on articles, Text Enhancer acts like a "linter for text" - giving you instant AI-powered suggestions to enhance your writing with a simple keyboard shortcut.
items.title: DebBidhi/text-enhancer: Text Enhancer is a lightweight browser extension that helps you improve your writing anywhere on the web. Whether you're writing social media posts, or commenting on articles, Text Enhancer acts like a "linter for text" - giving you instant AI-powered suggestions to enhance your writing with a simple keyboard shortcut.

items.content_html: MicDrop** is a modern, lightweight, and responsive music player built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It features a sleek design inspired by popular music apps, offering smooth animations, accessibility, and local storage support for a seamless user experience.
items.title: Teethedeveloper/HexSoftwares_Music_Player: MicDrop** is a modern, lightweight, and responsive music player built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It features a sleek design inspired by popular music apps, offering smooth animations, accessibility, and local storage support for a seamless user experience.
